name: Shadows 2: Perfidia
description: Shadows 2: Perfidia is a survival horror game inspired by classics like the Penumbra series and Layers of Fear. Explore a darkened office complex and uncover the truth behind the horrifying events that have befallen its inhabitants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
